sentences.english: Why are so many people always so critical of English players’ technique?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼總是有那麼多人對英國球員的技術那麼苛責？

sentences.english: I have stopped berating my personality self.
sentences.chinese: 我已經停止苛責自己的人格特性。

sentences.english: The plastics industry has slammed the EU for over-reacting and playing on parent's fears.
sentences.chinese: 塑料工業已經苛責歐盟反應過度強烈和引發家長擔憂。

sentences.english: The plastics industry has slammed the EU for over-reacting and playing on parent’s fears.
sentences.chinese: 塑料工業已經苛責歐盟反應過度強烈和引發家長擔憂。

sentences.english: Do Asian women who date mostly white guys take flak for it??
sentences.chinese: 男朋友大多是白人的亞裔女性有沒有受到過苛責呢？
傑出人士不會對自己苛責。

sentences.english: First, stop all criticism toward yourself and others.
sentences.chinese: 首先，停止所有對自己和對他人的苛責批判。

definition: to contend on strong grounds/to argue strongly for what is right
to force someone to do something
lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
to submit to humiliation (idiom); to suffer in silence/to swallow one's anger/to grin and bear it
(abbr. for 嘗試錯誤|尝试错误) trial and error/failure
